check_alive_clients() → bool[source]

Check if any client in the list self.clients has a flag for deletion. If a client has the flag set, it is removed from the list. If no clients are left in the list, it returns False. If clients are still present, it returns True.

Parameters: None

Returns: bool: True if clients are still present, False otherwise.

async close() → None[source]

Close the asyncio event loop and shutdown the logging system.

This method should be called when the server is no longer needed to free up system resources. It closes the asyncio event loop and shuts down the logging system.

Parameters: None

Returns: None

Raises: None

async server_async.main() → None[source]

The main function of the server application.

This function initializes a new instance of the ServerIEC104 class, starts listening for incoming client connections, and runs the server.

Parameters: None

Returns: None

Raises: None
